mapper.update:
update renyuan
rname = #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bid = #{bid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gongzi = #{gongzi,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

gongshang = #{gongshang,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where rid = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
